title: Firefox Reader View for clutter-free web pages
summary: Firefox Reader View removes web page clutter to improve readability. Recent Firefox versions can also read pages out loud.
html:
Reader View in Firefox helps you strip away clutter like buttons, ads, background images and videos, providing a clean and customizable reading experience. Here’s how to use it:

Table of Contents

  • 1 View a page in Reader View
  • 2 Reader View settings
    • 2.1 Modify Reader View settings

View a page in Reader View

  1. If a page is available in Reader View, the Reader View icon will appear in the address bar.
  2. Click on the Reader View icon ; a blue icon indicates the feature is currently active.
Tip: If a page is available in Reader View, you can also access Reader View from the Menu bar when the Menu bar is enabled, by clicking View then Enter Reader View. Alternatively, you can press the keys Ctrl + Alt + Rkey F9keys Command + Option + R to toggle Reader View.

Reader View settings

Once in Reader View, you can customize the layout to fit your preferences. Options are available on the left side of the article content:

Modify Reader View settings

  • Exit: To exit Reader View, simply click the ✕ cross button, click the Reader View icon again or use the back button on your browser.
  • Text: Adjust the layout (text font and size, content width, line height) and theme (light, sepia, dark) in Reader View.
  • Text: Once in Reader View, you can customize the layout to fit your preferences:
    • Text Size: Click the − or + buttons to decrease or increase the text size.
    • Font Style: Choose between Serif, Sans-serif and Monospace fonts. Adjust the font weight as Light, Regular or Bold.
    • Layout Options: Adjust the content width and line spacing to make the text more comfortable to read.
    • Advanced Options: Customize character spacing, word spacing and text alignment.
  • Theme: Select between Auto, Light, Dark, Sepia, Contrast and Gray backgrounds to change the appearance of the page, or create your custom theme.

  • Read aloud: Have Firefox read an article out loud in Reader View.
This option will show up only if WindowsmacOSLinux has Text-to-speech information in the language that the article is in.
  • Save to Pocket: Add a page to Pocket.


Firefox for Android: Reader View is also available on Firefox for Android. See View articles in Reader View on Firefox for Android.

Firefox for iOS: Reader View is also available on Firefox for iOS. See View web pages in Reader View.
